English: Paul, an apostle (not from men nor through man, but through Jesus Christ and God the Father who raised Him from the dead)
Bahnar: Inh Pôl chih hơpong kơ lu bơngai lui tơ dêh char Galati. Jet gia 'nhŏng oh. Lu 'nhŏng oh bơngai lui tơ inh âu kư̆m đei nơ̆r jet gia kơ iĕm mơ̆n. Inh pơm jơ̆ng 'bang Yêsu Krist yua kơ Sư ăn inh pơm jơ̆ng 'bang Sư. 'Bă Sư 'Bok Kei-Dei tơiung arih Sư đơ̆ng lôch păng Sư kư̆m ăn kơ inh pơm jơ̆ng 'bang Yêsu mơ̆n. Ưh kơ sĭ kon bơngai ăn kơ inh ôh. Ưh kơ sĭ kon bơngai pơtruh ăn kơ inh nơ̆r 'Bok Kei-Dei athei inh pơm jơ̆ng 'bang Yêsu ôh, inh kơtơ̆ng đơ̆ng Sư đĕch khan kơ inh.

English: and all the brethren who are with me, To the churches of Galatia
Bahnar: Inh Pôl chih hơpong kơ lu bơngai lui tơ dêh char Galati. Jet gia 'nhŏng oh. Lu 'nhŏng oh bơngai lui tơ inh âu kư̆m đei nơ̆r jet gia kơ iĕm mơ̆n. Inh pơm jơ̆ng 'bang Yêsu Krist yua kơ Sư ăn inh pơm jơ̆ng 'bang Sư. 'Bă Sư 'Bok Kei-Dei tơiung arih Sư đơ̆ng lôch păng Sư kư̆m ăn kơ inh pơm jơ̆ng 'bang Yêsu mơ̆n. Ưh kơ sĭ kon bơngai ăn kơ inh ôh. Ưh kơ sĭ kon bơngai pơtruh ăn kơ inh nơ̆r 'Bok Kei-Dei athei inh pơm jơ̆ng 'bang Yêsu ôh, inh kơtơ̆ng đơ̆ng Sư đĕch khan kơ inh.

English: Grace to you and peace from God the Father and our Lord Jesus Christ
Bahnar: Inh krao khan apinh 'Bă tơm bơ̆n 'Bok Kei-Dei hăm Kră Yang bơ̆n Yêsu Krist wei-lăng iĕm tôm tơdrong wă kơ Sư ăn kơ iĕm hiôk-hian ling-lang.

English: who gave Himself for our sins, that He might deliver us from this present evil age, according to the will of our God and Father
Bahnar: Kră Yang bơ̆n Yêsu Krist ăn akâu Sư kơdih wă lôch tang bơ̆n pơklaih bơ̆n đơ̆ng tơdrong yoch. Sư lôch tang bơ̆n wă iŏk bơ̆n đơ̆ng lu bơngai kơnê̆ ahrei âu. Sư pơm thoi noh wă kơ trŏ thoi 'Bă tơm bơ̆n 'Bok Kei-Dei wă.

English: to whom be glory forever and ever. Amen.
Bahnar: Bĕ bơ̆n ư-ang 'Bok Kei-Dei ling-lang ling-lang ưh kơ layơ tôch. A-men.

English: I marvel that you are turning away so soon from Him who called you in the grace of Christ, to a different gospel
Bahnar: Inh sơleng kơ đon yua kơ kiơ iĕm lui kơ nơ̆r đe pơlung wă achăng lê̆ nơ̆r 'Bok Kei-Dei 'bônh đĕch. 'Bok Kei-Dei krao bơ̆n wă kơ bơ̆n jing kon Sư, yua kơ Yêsu Krist lôch tang bơ̆n. Mă-lei dang ei iĕm wă kiơ̆ tơdrong 'nao 'lơ̆ng nai dơ̆ng.

English: which is not another; but there are some who trouble you and want to pervert the gospel of Christ.
Bahnar: Mă tơpă đei minh tơdrong 'nao 'lơ̆ng đĕch, ưh kơ đei tơdrong 'nao 'lơ̆ng nai dơ̆ng ôh. Inh khan kơ iĕm thoi noh yua kơ đei lu bơngai nai pơtuah iĕm, lu sư wă hơmet ming pơthim tơdrong 'nao 'lơ̆ng Yêsu Krist.

English: But even if we, or an angel from heaven, preach any other gospel to you than what we have preached to you, let him be accursed.
Bahnar: Sơ̆ nhôn bơtho ăn kơ iĕm tơdrong 'nao 'lơ̆ng trŏ tơpă, na dang ei mă bu bu, tơdah nhôn kơdih, dah linh jang 'lơ̆ng đơ̆ng plĕnh ti, bơtho ăn kơ iĕm tơdrong phara pơm wă pơhloh kơ nhôn bơtho iĕm sơ̆, ning-mônh 'Bok Kei-Dei gô phak sư tơpă.

English: As we have said before, so now I say again, if anyone preaches any other gospel to you than what you have received, let him be accursed.
Bahnar: Inh wă khan kơ iĕm dơ̆ng, kư̆m thoi nhôn khan boih kơ iĕm: Bơngai bu bơtho ăn kơ iĕm tơdrong phara pơm wă pơhloh kơ nhôn bơtho iĕm sơ̆ na jing ưh kơ trŏ thoi iĕm lui sơ̆, 'Bok Kei-Dei gô phak tơpă bơngai 'noh ning-mônh.

English: For do I now persuade men, or God? Or do I seek to please men? For if I still pleased men, I would not be a bondservant of Christ.
Bahnar: Inh pơma thoi noh kon bơngai ưh kơ lăp đon ôh. Mă-lei inh wă kơ 'Bok Kei-Dei lăp đon kơ tơdrong jang inh. Dah inh wă kơ kon bơngai lăp đon kơ inh đĕch lei ưh kơ sĭ inh jang tơdrong Yêsu Krist ôh.

English: But I make known to you, brethren, that the gospel which was preached by me is not according to man.
Bahnar: Ơ lu 'nhŏng oh, inh wă kơ iĕm hlôh tơdrong âu: Tơdrong 'nao 'lơ̆ng mă inh bơtho ăn kơ iĕm sơ̆, ưh kơ sĭ đơ̆ng kon bơngai pơjing ôh.

English: For I neither received it from man, nor was I taught it, but it came through the revelation of Jesus Christ.
Bahnar: Kon bơngai ưh kơ đei bơtho inh tơdrong noh, pôm Yêsu Krist đĕch tơbăt kơ inh tơdrong 'nao 'lơ̆ng Sư.

English: For you have heard of my former conduct in Judaism, how I persecuted the church of God beyond measure and tried to destroy it.
Bahnar: Iĕm kơtơ̆ng boih tơdrong arih inh thoi yơ sơ̆. Kơplah noh sơ̆ inh kiơ̆ tơdrong lu bơngai Juđê. Inh pơm kơnê̆ tơpă kơ lu bơngai lui kơ Kră Yang Yêsu Krist wă kơ tơdrong lui lu sư jah tôch.

English: And I advanced in Judaism beyond many of my contemporaries in my own nation, being more exceedingly zealous for the traditions of my fathers.
Bahnar: Inh kiơ̆ tơdrong juăt bơngai Juđê sơ̆, iung lu jơhnơr nhôn pôm inh jang kơtang hloh kơ lu sư. Inh adrin tơpă kiơ̆ tơdrong juăt lu yă 'bok nhôn sơ̆.

English: But when it pleased God, who separated me from my mother’s womb and called me through His grace
Bahnar: Mă-lei 'Bok Kei-Dei 'mêm mơnat kơ inh. Sư rơih iŏk inh đơ̆ng inh tam mă tơpŭ sơ̆. Sư krao inh wă kơ inh jang tơdrong Sư.

English: to reveal His Son in me, that I might preach Him among the Gentiles, I did not immediately confer with flesh and blood
Bahnar: Truh Sư wă tơ'bôh ăn kơ inh Yêsu Kon Sư, wă kơ inh năm bơtho tơdrong 'nao 'lơ̆ng Kon Sư kơ lu bơngai nai mă ưh kơ trŏ bơngai Juđê, kơplah noh inh ưh kơ đei năm pơhrăm đơ̆ng lu bơngai kiơ̆ Yêsu ôh.

English: nor did I go up to Jerusalem to those who were apostles before me; but I went to Arabia, and returned again to Damascus.
Bahnar: Inh kư̆m ưh kơ đei năm tơ Pơlei Jêrusalem chă hơpong kơ lu bơngai jơ̆ng 'bang Yêsu mă jang adrol kơ inh ôh. Inh năm tơ dêh char Arabia. Klaih kơ noh inh năm tơ Pơlei Đamas dơ̆ng.

English: Then after three years I went up to Jerusalem to see Peter, and remained with him fifteen days.
Bahnar: Đơ̆ng rŏng kơ inh lui kơ Yêsu pêng sơnăm na inh năm tơ Pơlei Jêrusalem hơpong kơ Pêtrôs. Inh oei păng sư tơ noh 'bar 'măng giĕng.

English: But I saw none of the other apostles except James, the Lord’s brother.
Bahnar: Inh kư̆m tơ'bơ̆p Yakơ oh Yêsu mơ̆n, mă-lei inh ưh kơ đei tơ'bơ̆p jơ̆ng 'bang Yêsu nai ôh kơplah noh.

English: (Now concerning the things which I write to you, indeed, before God, I do not lie.)
Bahnar: Dôm tơdrong inh chih âu trŏ tơpă. 'Bok Kei-Dei 'bôh bơ̆n na inh ưh kơ pơ̆n hơlĕnh ôh.

English: Afterward I went into the regions of Syria and Cilicia.
Bahnar: Đơ̆ng rŏng kơ inh hơpong kơ Pêtrôs noh na inh năm tơ dêh char Siri păng dêh char Salisia.

English: And I was unknown by face to the churches of Judea which were in Christ.
Bahnar: Kơplah dôm sơnăm noh lu bơngai lui tơ dêh char Juđê tam mă tơ'bơ̆p inh ôh.

English: But they were hearing only, “He who formerly persecuted us now preaches the faith which he once tried to destroy.”
Bahnar: Mă-lei lu sư kơtơ̆ng ang đe khan thoi âu: “Pôl sơ̆ pơm kơnê̆ kơ bơ̆n dêh, sư wă pơrăm tơdrong bơ̆n lui, mă-lei dang ei đe khan sư bơtho tơdrong bơ̆n lui boih.”

English: Then after fourteen years I went up again to Jerusalem with Barnabas, and also took Titus with me.
Bahnar: Đơ̆ng rŏng kơ noh mơjĭt-puăn sơnăm nhi 'Barna'ba wih dơ̆ng tơ Pơlei Jêrusalem anhăk ba Tĭt kiơ̆ nhi.

English: And I went up by revelation, and communicated to them that gospel which I preach among the Gentiles, but privately to those who were of reputation, lest by any means I might run, or had run, in vain.
Bahnar: Inh năm tơ Pơlei Jêrusalem yua kơ 'Bok Kei-Dei athei inh năm. Inh akŭm păng lu bơngai pơm tih pơgơ̆r bơngai lui, wă roi kơ lu sư tơdrong 'nao 'lơ̆ng inh bơtho kơ lu bơngai mă ưh kơ khŭl Juđê. Nhôn akŭm kơdrô̆ nhôn đĕch. Inh roi kơ lu sư nhên gah tơdrong inh bơtho wă kơ lu sư băt dôm tơdrong inh bơtho noh, jĭ minh tơdrong trŏ tơpă. Dah inh ưh kơ roi kơ lu sư, lei inh hli kơ lu sư jô̆ kơ inh bơtho tơdrong ưh kơ tơpă. Mă-lei lu sư ưh kơ đei jô̆ kơ tơdrong jang inh khan tơdrong jang ưh kơ tơpă, lu sư ưh kơ đei khan thoi noh ôh.

English: Yet not even Titus who was with me, being a Greek, was compelled to be circumcised.
Bahnar: Tĭt sư bơngai Grĕk sư kư̆m lui kơ Yêsu boih, sư ưh tam mă kăt tơdra akar sư kiơ̆ kơ tơdrong juăt nhôn bơngai Juđê, mă-lei lu bơngai pơgơ̆r bơngai lui kư̆m ưh kơ đei athei Tĭt kăt tơdra akar sư mơ̆n.

English: And this occurred because of false brethren secretly brought in (who came in by stealth to spy out our liberty which we have in Christ Jesus, that they might bring us into bondage)
Bahnar: Đei mơ̆n lu bơngai nai đĕch athei nhôn kăt tơdra akar Tĭt. Mă-lei lu bơngai noh ưh kơ trŏ bơngai lui tơpă ôh. Lu sư mơ̆t akŭm hơdai hăm nhôn, lăng sư thoi bơngai lui mơ̆n, mă tơpă lăm to sư ưh ôh. Bơ̆n bơngai rơngei yua kơ bơ̆n lui kơ Yêsu Krist. Bơ̆n ưh kơ kăl kiơ̆ dôm tơdrong juăt lu bơngai Juđê mă đơ̆ng Môis pơkă kơ sư. Lu sư mơ̆t akŭm hơdai nhôn wă chă lăng tơdrong bơ̆n lui thoi yơ, lu sư wă kơ bơ̆n kiơ̆ dôm tơdrong juăt lu bơngai Juđê. Tơdrong juăt bơngai Juđê anat tơpă, dah bu wă kiơ̆, bơngai 'noh sư dang jing đĭch.

English: to whom we did not yield submission even for an hour, that the truth of the gospel might continue with you.
Bahnar: Dôm tơdrong lu sư wă kơ nhôn pơm, nhôn ưh kơ chu ôh. Nhôn ưh kơ đei layơ wă tơplih tơdrong 'nao 'lơ̆ng Yêsu Krist mă 'lơ̆ng tơpăt ôh. Nhôn wă kơ iĕm huay kăl kiơ̆ dôm tơdrong juăt bơngai Juđê.

English: But from those who seemed to be something—whatever they were, it makes no difference to me; God shows personal favoritism to no man—for those who seemed to be something added nothing to me.
Bahnar: Lu bơngai đe pôk pơm tih pơgơ̆r bơngai lui, inh băt mơ̆n lu sư oei hơdai Yêsu sơ̆, mă-lei 'Bok Kei-Dei pơgơ̆p jơhngơ̆m đon lu nhôn lei-lăi đĕch, lu sư ưh kơ đei wă ming tơplih tơdrong inh bơtho ôh.

English: But on the contrary, when they saw that the gospel for the uncircumcised had been committed to me, as the gospel for the circumcised was to Peter
Bahnar: Lu sư băt kơ 'Bok Kei-Dei wơh inh bơtho tơdrong 'nao 'lơ̆ng sư kơ lu bơngai mă ưh kơ khŭl Juđê lu sư kư̆m ưh kơ kăt tơdra akar, kư̆m thoi 'Bok Kei-Dei wơh Pêtrôs năm chă bơtho khŭl sư bơngai Juđê.

English: (for He who worked effectively in Peter for the apostleship to the circumcised also worked effectively in me toward the Gentiles)
Bahnar: Lu sư băt thoi noh yua kơ lu sư 'bôh 'Bok Kei-Dei ăn kơ inh pơm jơ̆ng 'bang Yêsu năm chă bơtho đe đei lơi lơ bơngai lui kơ inh bơtho tơpă, kư̆m thoi 'Bok Kei-Dei ăn kơ Pêtrôs pơm jơ̆ng 'bang Yêsu năm chă bơtho đe đei lơi mơ̆n.

English: and when James, Cephas, and John, who seemed to be pillars, perceived the grace that had been given to me, they gave me and Barnabas the right hand of fellowship, that we should go to the Gentiles and they to the circumcised.
Bahnar: Thoi noh na Yakơ, Pêtrôs, Yôhan, lu sư bơngai mă đe pôk pơm tih pơgơ̆r lu bơngai lui đơ̆ng sơ̆ boih, lu sư băt tơpă kơ 'Bok Kei-Dei ăn kơ inh năm chă bơtho kơ lu bơngai mă ưh kơ khŭl Juđê, na lu sư iung rôp ti nhi 'Barna'ba dang wă khan pơgơ̆p băl minh jơhngơ̆m minh đon jang tơdrong 'Bok Kei-Dei. Lu sư bơtho tơdrong 'Bok Kei-Dei kơ lu khŭl sư bơngai Juđê, na nhi bơtho kơ lu khŭl bơngai nai.

English: They desired only that we should remember the poor, the very thing which I also was eager to do.
Bahnar: Lu sư pơma kơ nhi pôm tơdrong athei tơgŭm mơnat kơ lu bơngai dơnuh hin đe Juđê, na inh khan kơ lu sư: “Lăp kơ tơdrong 'noh đơ̆ng sơ̆ inh kư̆m băt tơchĕng ră mơ̆n.”

English: Now when Peter had come to Antioch, I withstood him to his face, because he was to be blamed
Bahnar: Sơ̆ Pêtrôs năm tơ Pơlei Antiôs, inh khă sư, yua kơ sư pơm ưh kơ trŏ tơpă. Sư pơm thoi âu

English: for before certain men came from James, he would eat with the Gentiles; but when they came, he withdrew and separated himself, fearing those who were of the circumcision.
Bahnar: Sơ̆ Pêtrôs năm hơpong tơ pơlei nhôn Antiôs, sư kư̆m sŏng sa hơdai lu bơngai nai mă ưh kơ khŭl sư mơ̆n. Na đei minh năr ei Yakơ wơh buăl sư năm tơ nhôn. Lăp lu nhôn wă sŏng sa, na Pêtrôs ưh kơ pơ̆n sŏng sa hơdai hăm lu bơngai mă ưh kơ khŭl sư, yua kơ sư hli kơ buăl sư mă 'nao truh noh hil kơ sư. Lu bơngai noh athei đĭ-đăng lu bơngai lui kơ Yêsu kăt tơdra akar păng ưh kơ ăn lu bơngai Juđê sŏng sa hơdai lu bơngai mă ưh kơ khŭl sư.

English: And the rest of the Jews also played the hypocrite with him, so that even Barnabas was carried away with their hypocrisy.
Bahnar: Na lu bơngai Juđê mă oei tơ Pơlei Antiôs ei mơ'nah kư̆m lui kơ Yêsu mơ̆n, lu sư kư̆m kiơ̆ Pêtrôs hơdai ưh kơ pơ̆n, kuă kơ sŏng sa thoi Pêtrôs mơ̆n truh tơ 'Barna'ba kư̆m lei-lăi thoi lu sư.

English: But when I saw that they were not straightforward about the truth of the gospel, I said to Peter before them all, “If you, being a Jew, live in the manner of Gentiles and not as the Jews, why do you compel Gentiles to live as Jews?
Bahnar: Inh 'bôh lu sư kiơ̆ tơdrong 'nao 'lơ̆ng Yêsu ưh kơ 'blep trŏ thoi noh boih na inh bơtho Pêtrôs 'bơ̆t anăp lu sư thoi âu: “Ih bơngai Juđê, krô hmă ih ưh pă wă kiơ̆ boih tơdrong juăt bơngai Juđê, na dang ei thoi yơ ih wă athei lu bơngai ưh kơ khŭl bơ̆n kiơ̆ tơdrong juăt bơ̆n so dơ̆ng?”

English: We who are Jews by nature, and not sinners of the Gentiles
Bahnar: Nhôn bơngai Juđê đơ̆ng mĕ bơ̆n tơpŭ. Nhôn ưh kơ sĭ bơngai nai ôh. Nhôn kiơ̆ tơdrong juăt 'Bok Kei-Dei pơkă, lu bơngai nai ưh kơ kiơ̆ ôh.

English: knowing that a man is not justified by the works of the law but by faith in Jesus Christ, even we have believed in Christ Jesus, that we might be justified by faith in Christ and not by the works of the law; for by the works of the law no flesh shall be justified.
Bahnar: Mă-lei nhôn lui kơ Yêsu boih, nhôn băt kơdih 'Bok Kei-Dei jô̆ lu nhôn 'lơ̆ng tơpăt hăm Sư noh yua kơ nhôn lui păng gơnang kơ Yêsu Krist, ưh kơ sĭ yua kơ nhôn lui kiơ̆ tơdrong juăt Môis khŏm khŏm na 'Bok Kei-Dei jô̆ bơ̆n 'lơ̆ng tơpăt hăm Sư ôh. Dang ei nhôn lui boih kơ Yêsu Krist, na mă 'Bok Kei-Dei jô̆ nhôn bơngai 'lơ̆ng tơpăt hăm Sư. Ưh kơ đei bu 'Bok Kei-Dei wă jô̆ sư 'lơ̆ng tơpăt, dah sư oei gơnang kơ akâu sư kơdih wă kiơ̆ tơdrong juăt Môis.

English: “But if, while we seek to be justified by Christ, we ourselves also are found sinners, is Christ therefore a minister of sin? Certainly not!
Bahnar: Dang ei nhôn lui kơ Yêsu Krist wă kơ 'Bok Kei-Dei jô̆ nhôn bơngai 'lơ̆ng tơpăt hăm Sư, na nhôn huay pă kăl kiơ̆ tôm tơdrong juăt Môis kư̆m lei-lăi thoi bơngai ưh kơ sĭ khŭl Juđê sư ưh kơ kiơ̆ tơdrong juăt Môis ôh. Na iĕm tơchĕng thoi yơ dang ei? Iĕm tơchĕng dôm tơdrong juăt 'Bok Kei-Dei, Yêsu Krist kuă ăn bơ̆n lui hă? Ưh ôh.

English: For if I build again those things which I destroyed, I make myself a transgressor.
Bahnar: Đei bơngai mơ'nah tơchĕng kiơ̆ tơdrong juăt Môis ưh kơ klaih đơ̆ng tơdrong yoch ôh. Na sư lui kơ Yêsu, sư gơnang kơ Yêsu tơgŭm sư đĕch, sư ưh pă kiơ̆ tơdrong juăt Môis. Mă-lei đơ̆ng rŏng kơ noh sư jing kuă dơ̆ng kơ kiơ̆ Yêsu achăng lê̆ tơdrong lui sư wih kiơ̆ tôm tơdrong juăt Môis dơ̆ng, sư khan wă kơ 'Bok Kei-Dei jô̆ sư bơngai 'lơ̆ng tơpăt. Mă-lei bơngai 'noh boih pơm yoch tơpă.

English: For I through the law died to the law that I might live to God.
Bahnar: Sơ̆ inh kư̆m kiơ̆ mơ̆n tơdrong juăt Môis, mă-lei inh tơchĕng akâu inh kơdih đĕch kiơ̆, mă tơpă lăm to inh ưh kơ 'lơ̆ng hăm 'Bok Kei-Dei ôh. Thoi noh na inh ưh pă gơnang kơ akâu inh kơdih wă kiơ̆ tơdrong juăt Môis, akâu inh dang lĕ kơ lôch, wă kơ inh iung arih gơnang kơ 'Bok Kei-Dei đĕch.

English: I have been crucified with Christ; it is no longer I who live, but Christ lives in me; and the life which I now live in the flesh I live by faith in the Son of God, who loved me and gave Himself for me.
Bahnar: Inh dang lĕ lôch hơdai hăm Yêsu Krist tơ 'long pơglang sơ̆ boih yua kơ akâu inh kơdih ưh kơ gơh pơm minh tơdrong kiơ ôh. Na dang ei inh ưh pă gơnang kơ akâu inh kơdih boih, inh gơnang kơ Yêsu Krist mă arih lăm akâu inh, lê̆ kơ Sư chă dui ba inh kiơ̆ kơ tơdrong Sư wă. Inh gơnang kơ Sư yua kơ Sư Kon 'Bok Kei-Dei tơpă, Sư 'mêm mơnat kơ inh mah ăn akâu Sư kơdih lôch tang inh.

English: I do not set aside the grace of God; for if righteousness comes through the law, then Christ died in vain.”
Bahnar: Dah 'Bok Kei-Dei jô̆ bơ̆n bơngai 'lơ̆ng tơpăt hăm Sư yua kơ bơ̆n lui kiơ̆ tơdrong juăt Môis đĕch, lei Yêsu Krist lôch tang bơ̆n tơ 'long pơglang noh ưh kơ yua kiơ ôh kơ bơ̆n. Gah inh, inh băt tơpă 'Bok Kei-Dei jô̆ inh bơngai 'lơ̆ng tơpăt hăm Sư yua kơ Kon Sư lôch tang yua kơ tơdrong yoch inh.

English: O foolish Galatians! Who has bewitched you that you should not obey the truth, before whose eyes Jesus Christ was clearly portrayed among you as crucified?
Bahnar: Ơ bơngai Galati, iĕm ưh kơ hlôh tơpă iih, iĕm lui kiơ̆ kơ đe pơtuah iĕm? Sơ̆ nhôn bơtho iĕm nhên tơpă boih gah tơdrong Kră Yang Yêsu Krist lôch tang iĕm tơ 'long pơglang.

English: This only I want to learn from you: Did you receive the Spirit by the works of the law, or by the hearing of faith?
Bahnar: Inh đei tơdrong kăl wă jet iĕm: 'Bok Kei-Dei ăn kơ iĕm Yang Bơhngol 'Lơ̆ng Sư sơ̆, yua kơ iĕm kiơ̆ tơdrong juăt Môis hă? Dah yua kơ iĕm lui kơ Yêsu Krist?

English: Are you so foolish? Having begun in the Spirit, are you now being made perfect by the flesh?
Bahnar: Lơliơ iĕm ưh kơ hlôh tơdrong âu? Iĕm pơtơm lui kơ Yêsu sơ̆, iĕm gơnang kơ Yang Bơhngol 'Lơ̆ng tơpă, na Sư gơh ăn kơ iĕm đei jơhngơ̆m pran pơm kiơ̆ tôm tơdrong thoi Sư wă. Kơlih kơ kiơ iĕm ưh pă gơnang kơ Sư dơ̆ng, na dang ei iĕm khan wă gơnang kơ akâu iĕm kơdih đĕch păng iĕm khan oei lui kơjăp ră, liơ gơh trŏ thoi noh?

English: Have you suffered so many things in vain—if indeed it was in vain?
Bahnar: Kơplah iĕm gơnang kơ Yêsu sơ̆ 'Bok Kei-Dei tơgŭm iĕm tôm tơdrong tơpă. Mă-lei dang ei iĕm pơm khan sơ̆ Sư ưh kơ tơgŭm iĕm dah kiơ? Dôm tơdrong noh Sư tơgŭm iĕm tơpă yơh.

English: Therefore He who supplies the Spirit to you and works miracles among you, does He do it by the works of the law, or by the hearing of faith?
Bahnar: Inh wă jet iĕm dơ̆ng: 'Bok Kei-Dei ăn kơ iĕm Yang Bơhngol 'Lơ̆ng păng ăn kơ iĕm gơh pơm tơdrong mơsêh, yua kơ iĕm kiơ̆ tơdrong juăt Môis, dah yua kơ iĕm gơnang kơ Yêsu Krist?

English: just as Abraham “believed God, and it was accounted to him for righteousness.”
Bahnar: Tơdrong 'noh kư̆m thoi đe chih tơdrong Abraham wă kơ bơ̆n đŏk lăng lăm sơ̆p hla bơar 'Bok Kei-Dei thoi âu: “Abraham đei đon lui păng gơnang kơ 'Bok Kei-Dei na 'Bok Kei-Dei jô̆ sư bơngai 'lơ̆ng tơpăt.”

English: Therefore know that only those who are of faith are sons of Abraham.
Bahnar: Kơlih kơ thoi noh na bơ̆n athei băt dôm lu bơngai mă lui păng gơnang kơ 'Bok Kei-Dei, lu sư noh dang lĕ kon sâu Abraham tơpă.

English: And the Scripture, foreseeing that God would justify the Gentiles by faith, preached the gospel to Abraham beforehand, saying, “In you all the nations shall be blessed.”
Bahnar: 'Bok Kei-Dei băt hơdrol đơ̆ng sơ̆ boih gah tơdrong lu bơngai mă lui kơ Sư, mă bơngai Juđê, mă bơngai khŭl nai, Sư jô̆ 'lơ̆ng tơpăt ngăl. Kơlih kơ thoi noh na Sư roi tơdrong 'nao 'lơ̆ng noh hơdrol kơ Abraham sơ̆ thoi âu: “Ơ Abraham, yua kơ ih, na Inh wă tơgŭm tôm kơ khŭl bơngai oei tơ ala teh.”

English: So then those who are of faith are blessed with believing Abraham.
Bahnar: Kơlih kơ Abraham lui păng gơnang kơ 'Bok Kei-Dei tơpă, na 'Bok Kei-Dei tơgŭm sư tơpă mơ̆n. Thoi noh na dôm lu bơngai lui păng gơnang kơ 'Bok Kei-Dei, 'Bok Kei-Dei kư̆m wă tơgŭm lu sư lei-lăi thoi noh mơ̆n.

English: For as many as are of the works of the law are under the curse; for it is written, “Cursed is everyone who does not continue in all things which are written in the book of the law, to do them.”
Bahnar: Mă-lei dôm lu bơngai mă gơnang kơ akâu sư kơdih wă kiơ̆ tơdrong juăt Môis khan gơh klaih đơ̆ng tơdrong yoch păng khan gơh jing bơngai 'lơ̆ng tơpăt hăm 'Bok Kei-Dei, lu bơngai noh kơnh 'Bok Kei-Dei wă phak lu sư, kơlih kơ lăm sơ̆p hla bơar 'Bok Kei-Dei khan boih hơdrol sơ̆ thoi âu: “'Bok Kei-Dei wă phak dôm lu bơngai mă ưh kơ kiơ̆ tôm tơdrong mă chih boih lăm sơ̆p hla bơar tơdrong juăt 'Bok Kei-Dei.”

English: But that no one is justified by the law in the sight of God is evident, for “the just shall live by faith.”
Bahnar: Thoi âu dơ̆ng, bơ̆n băt boih dôm lu bơngai mă gơnang kơ akâu sư kơdih pơm kiơ̆ tơdrong juăt Môis, lu sư 'noh 'Bok Kei-Dei ưh kơ jô̆ lu sư bơngai 'lơ̆ng ôh. Bơ̆n băt thoi noh boih yua kơ sơ̆p hla bơar 'Bok Kei-Dei khan boih thoi âu: “Bơngai bu lui păng gơnang kơ 'Bok Kei-Dei, 'Bok Kei-Dei jô̆ sư bơngai 'lơ̆ng tơpăt ăn kơ sư arih ling-lang.”

English: Yet the law is not of faith, but “the man who does them shall live by them.”
Bahnar: Sơ̆p hla bơar Sư kư̆m đei khan dơ̆ng thoi âu: “Bơngai bu kiơ̆ tôm tơdrong juăt, 'Bok Kei-Dei gô ăn kơ sư arih ling-lang.” Thoi noh na lu bơngai gơnang kơ akâu sư kơdih wă kiơ̆ tơdrong juăt Môis, lu sư kuă kơ gơnang kơ 'Bok Kei-Dei gơh mơnat ăn kơ lu sư arih ling-lang ôh. Lu sư wă gơnang kơ akâu lu sư gơh pơm kiơ̆ tôm tơdrong juăt đĕch khan gơh arih ling-lang, mă-lei lu sư kư̆m ưh kơ kĕ kiơ̆ ôh.

English: Christ has redeemed us from the curse of the law, having become a curse for us (for it is written, “Cursed is everyone who hangs on a tree”)
Bahnar: Bơ̆n ưh kơ kĕ ôh kiơ̆ tôm tơdrong juăt 'Bok Kei-Dei, na trŏ yơh kơ 'Bok Kei-Dei wă phak bơ̆n, mă-lei Yêsu Krist dŏng pơklaih bơ̆n wă huai iŏk bơ̆n đơ̆ng tơdrong yoch wă kơ 'Bok Kei-Dei huay kơ phak bơ̆n. Sơ̆p hla bơar 'Bok Kei-Dei khan boih thoi âu: “Kon bơngai bu pơm yoch na tơduă kon bơngai phak pơlôch bơngai mă pơm yoch noh atol sư tơ kơpal 'long, 'Bok Kei-Dei kư̆m wă kơ phak bơngai mă pơm yoch noh tơpă mơ̆n.” Na Yêsu lôch tơ 'long pơglang kư̆m trŏ kơ phak thoi noh yua kơ tơdrong yoch bơ̆n.

English: that the blessing of Abraham might come upon the Gentiles in Christ Jesus, that we might receive the promise of the Spirit through faith.
Bahnar: Yêsu huai iŏk bơ̆n boih, na mă 'Bok Kei-Dei tơgŭm kơ đĭ-đăng kơ bơ̆n, mă bơngai Juđê, mă bơngai ưh kơ sĭ khŭl Juđê, noh kư̆m thoi Sư pơkă kơ Abraham bơ̆n sơ̆ khan wă tơgŭm bơ̆n, wă khan ăn kơ bơ̆n Yang Bơhngol 'Lơ̆ng dah bu lui păng gơnang kơ Sư.

English: Brethren, I speak in the manner of men: Though it is only a man’s covenant, yet if it is confirmed, no one annuls or adds to it.
Bahnar: Ơ 'nhŏng oh, inh wă pơma tơdrong pơtih gia ăn kơ iĕm thoi âu: Dah 'bar 'nu bơngai pơgơ̆p dih băl tơdrong kiơ kiơ, na chih anăn bre sư tơ lăm hla bơar pơgơ̆p noh, na lu bơngai nai ưh kơ đei bu gơh sut tơhiong lê̆ dah chih pơthim ăn tơ lăm hla bơar pơgơ̆p noh dơ̆ng.

English: Now to Abraham and his Seed were the promises made. He does not say, “And to seeds,” as of many, but as of one, “And to your Seed,” who is Christ.
Bahnar: Tơdrong 'Bok Kei-Dei pơkă kơ Abraham noh kư̆m thoi tơdrong pơgơ̆p noh hei mơ̆n, tơdrong noh 'Bok Kei-Dei khan wă ăn kơ Abraham păng kon sâu sư tơpă. Lăm sơ̆p hla bơar 'Bok Kei-Dei khan boih thoi âu: “Tơdrong pơkă noh inh wă ăn kơ kon sâu ih tơpă.” Mă-lei ưh kơ đei khan wă ăn đĭ-đăng kơ lu kon sâu sư hloi ôh. Sư wă ăn kơ minh 'nu bơngai đĕch, bơngai noh wă khan Yêsu Krist.

English: And this I say, that the law, which was four hundred and thirty years later, cannot annul the covenant that was confirmed before by God in Christ, that it should make the promise of no effect.
Bahnar: Tơdrong inh pơma pơtih gia gah tơdrong pơgơ̆p băl noh hei, inh wă khan thoi âu: Kră Yang 'Bok Kei-Dei pơkă kơ Abraham păng đĭ-đăng lu bơ̆n kon sâu sư sơ̆, khan wă tơgŭm lu bơ̆n, Sư wă tơgŭm tơpă. Na đơ̆ng rŏng kơ 'Bok Kei-Dei pơkă thoi noh sơ̆, truh tơ puăn-hrĕng pêng-jĭt sơnăm, na đei Môis pơkă ăn kơ yă 'bok bơ̆n tơdrong juăt 'Bok Kei-Dei dơ̆ng. Mă 'Bok Kei-Dei ăn kơ Môis pơkă ăn kơ bơ̆n tơdrong juăt đơ̆ng rŏng noh, Sư ưh kơ achăng lê̆ tơdrong Sư pơkă hơdrol khan wă tơgŭm bơ̆n noh ôh.

English: For if the inheritance is of the law, it is no longer of promise; but God gave it to Abraham by promise.
Bahnar: Mă tơpă 'Bok Kei-Dei wă tơgŭm bơ̆n yua kơ Sư pơkă kơ Abraham bơ̆n sơ̆, ưh kơ sĭ Sư wă tơgŭm bơ̆n yua kơ bơ̆n kiơ̆ tơdrong juăt Sư ôh. Dah 'Bok Kei-Dei tơgŭm bơ̆n yua kơ bơ̆n kiơ̆ tôm tơdrong Sư ată lei bơ̆n ưh kơ kăl kơ tơdrong Sư mơnat kơ bơ̆n tơdrong Sư khan wă tơgŭm kơ bơ̆n dơ̆ng.

English: What purpose then does the law serve? It was added because of transgressions, till the Seed should come to whom the promise was made; and it was appointed through angels by the hand of a mediator.
Bahnar: Yua kơ kiơ 'Bok Kei-Dei pơkă kơ bơ̆n tơdrong juăt Sư? Yua kơ Sư wă tơbăt ăn kơ bơ̆n tơdrong 'lơ̆ng tơdrong kơnê̆. Mă-lei dôm tơdrong 'lơ̆ng trŏ kơ tơdrong juăt Sư pơkă kơ bơ̆n noh, Sư wă kơ kon bơngai lui kiơ̆ truh tơ kon sâu Abraham đei minh 'nu bơngai mă 'Bă Sư 'Bok Kei-Dei wă tơgŭm Sư noh. Tơdrong juăt 'Bok Kei-Dei pơkă sơ̆, linh jang 'lơ̆ng ăn kơ Môis tơdrong juăt noh na Môis ăn kơ kon bơngai. Thoi noh Môis pơm 'long sơlam kơ kon bơngai hăm 'Bok Kei-Dei.

English: Now a mediator does not mediate for one only, but God is one.
Bahnar: Mă gah tơdrong 'Bok Kei-Dei mơnat pơkă khan wă tơgŭm bơ̆n, Sư ưh kơ kăl kơ kon bơngai pơm 'long sơlam ôh, tơ'ngla 'Bok Kei-Dei khan kơdih Sư hloi.

English: Is the law then against the promises of God? Certainly not! For if there had been a law given which could have given life, truly righteousness would have been by the law.
Bahnar: Mă 'Bok Kei-Dei pơkă tơdrong juăt Sư đơ̆ng rŏng noh sơ̆, Sư ưh kơ đei wă achăng lê̆ tơdrong Sư pơkă mă hơdrol khan wă tơgŭm bơ̆n ôh. Sơ̆ dah 'Bok Kei-Dei wă pơkă ăn kơ bơ̆n tơdrong juăt plơ̆ng nai, na bơ̆n kiơ̆ tơdrong juăt noh pran kơtang gơh kĕ pơm kiơ̆ tôm tơdrong 'blep trŏ thoi Sư wă, lei 'Bok Kei-Dei kư̆m jô̆ bơ̆n bơngai 'lơ̆ng tơpăt mơ̆n. Mă-lei sơ̆ 'Bok Kei-Dei ưh kơ ăn bơ̆n pơm kiơ̆ thoi noh ôh.

English: But the Scripture has confined all under sin, that the promise by faith in Jesus Christ might be given to those who believe.
Bahnar: Sơ̆p hla bơar 'Bok Kei-Dei jô̆ đĭ-đăng kon bơngai bơ̆n pơm yoch, ưh kơ chu kiơ̆ tơdrong juăt Sư, trŏ kơ Sư wă phak tơpă ning-mônh. 'Bok Kei-Dei pơma jô̆ bơ̆n thoi noh, Sư kuă ăn bơ̆n tơchĕng kiơ̆ tơdrong akâu bơ̆n kơdih. Sư wă kơ bơ̆n tơchĕng gơnang kơ Kon Sư đĕch. Dôm lu bơngai lui kơ Kon Sư Yêsu Krist, 'Bok Kei-Dei wă ăn kơ lu sư arih ling-lang hăm Sư, kư̆m thoi Sư pơkă kơ Abraham sơ̆.

English: But before faith came, we were kept under guard by the law, kept for the faith which would afterward be revealed.
Bahnar: Hơdrol kơ Yêsu Krist jur tơ ala teh âu sơ̆, đĭ-đăng kon bơngai bơ̆n ưh kơ kĕ kiơ̆ tơdrong juăt 'Bok Kei-Dei ôh, na kon bơngai bơ̆n trŏ kơ 'Bok Kei-Dei wă phak tơpă păng bơ̆n dang lĕ đe tah lăm hnam phak. Mă-lei lăp Yêsu Krist jur tơ ala teh âu sơ̆ bơ̆n klaih đĭ đơ̆ng tôm tơdrong yoch, yua kơ bơ̆n lui kơ Sư.

English: Therefore the law was our tutor to bring us to Christ, that we might be justified by faith.
Bahnar: Pơtih gia kơ tơdrong juăt 'Bok Kei-Dei dang lĕ minh 'nu bơngai anhăk ba lu hơ'lơ̆p pơhrăm chư tơ hnam trưng. Na truh tơ hnam trưng boih na lu đe hơ'lơ̆p ưh pă kăl kơ bơngai năm ba boih. 'Noh kư̆m dang lĕ tơdrong juăt 'Bok Kei-Dei anhăk ba kon bơngai bơ̆n tơ Yêsu Krist, na 'Bok Kei-Dei jô̆ bơ̆n bơngai 'lơ̆ng tơpăt hăm sư yua kơ bơ̆n lui kơ Yêsu.

English: But after faith has come, we are no longer under a tutor.
Bahnar: Na dang ei Yêsu Krist jur tơ bơ̆n boih, bơ̆n lui kơ Sư boih, na 'Bok Kei-Dei jô̆ bơ̆n bơngai 'lơ̆ng tơpăt hăm Sư, bơ̆n huay pă kăl gơnang kơ tơdrong juăt 'Bok Kei-Dei anhăk bơ̆n tơ Yêsu.

English: For you are all sons of God through faith in Christ Jesus.
Bahnar: Dang ei đĭ-đăng kơ bơ̆n jing kon 'Bok Kei-Dei boih yua kơ bơ̆n lui kơ Yêsu.

English: For as many of you as were baptized into Christ have put on Christ.
Bahnar: Đĭ-đăng kơ bơ̆n lui kơ Yêsu, klaih kơ noh iŏk 'batem, wă kơ bơ̆n jing pôm đon păng Sư.

English: There is neither Jew nor Greek, there is neither slave nor free, there is neither male nor female; for you are all one in Christ Jesus.
Bahnar: Kră Yang Yêsu Krist đih sơng glơng iŏk đĭ-đăng bơngai lui kơ Sư, ưh kơ đei achăng lê̆ bu bu ôh, mă khan bơngai Juđê, bơngai tơmoi nai, mă bơngai đĭch đe, mă bơngai rơngei, bơngai drŏ-nglo dah drŏ-kăn, đĭ-đăng kơ bơ̆n pôm đon dih băl păng pôm đon hăm Yêsu Krist.

English: And if you are Christ’s, then you are Abraham’s seed, and heirs according to the promise.
Bahnar: Dah bơ̆n pôm đon hăm Yêsu Krist, lei lu bơ̆n dang kon sâu Abraham tơpă, na 'Bok Kei-Dei gô tơgŭm bơ̆n dôm tơdrong 'lơ̆ng thoi Sư pơkă kơ Abraham sơ̆.

English: Now I say that the heir, as long as he is a child, does not differ at all from a slave, though he is master of all
Bahnar: Na dang ei inh wă pơma pơtrơp tơdrong 'noh hei. Pơtih gia kơ minh 'nu bơngai lôch achăng kon sư oei 'lơ̆p. Hơdrol kơ sư lôch sư pơkă kơ kon sư khan mưh kon sư tih tơdăm boih, athei kon sư iŏk tơwih dôm lu mŭk tơmam mă sư pơjao kơ kon sư. Kơplah kon sư oei 'lơ̆p đe jô̆ tơmam noh tơmam kon sư mơ̆n, mă-lei đei bơngai nai wei-lăng akâu kon sư păng tơmam kon sư, na kon sư dang bơngai đĭch đĕch, sư ưh kơ gơh pơm kiơ̆ kơ đon sư tơchĕng kơdih ôh. Mă-lei mưh truh sư 'lŏ boih sư iŏk tơwih kơdih đĭ-đăng mŭk tơmam 'bă sư păng gơh jang kiơ̆ kơ đon sư tơchĕng kơdih.

English: but is under guardians and stewards until the time appointed by the father.
Bahnar: Na dang ei inh wă pơma pơtrơp tơdrong 'noh hei. Pơtih gia kơ minh 'nu bơngai lôch achăng kon sư oei 'lơ̆p. Hơdrol kơ sư lôch sư pơkă kơ kon sư khan mưh kon sư tih tơdăm boih, athei kon sư iŏk tơwih dôm lu mŭk tơmam mă sư pơjao kơ kon sư. Kơplah kon sư oei 'lơ̆p đe jô̆ tơmam noh tơmam kon sư mơ̆n, mă-lei đei bơngai nai wei-lăng akâu kon sư păng tơmam kon sư, na kon sư dang bơngai đĭch đĕch, sư ưh kơ gơh pơm kiơ̆ kơ đon sư tơchĕng kơdih ôh. Mă-lei mưh truh sư 'lŏ boih sư iŏk tơwih kơdih đĭ-đăng mŭk tơmam 'bă sư păng gơh jang kiơ̆ kơ đon sư tơchĕng kơdih.

English: Even so we, when we were children, were in bondage under the elements of the world.
Bahnar: Bơ̆n kư̆m thoi noh mơ̆n sơ̆. Lu bơ̆n thoi lĕ kơ bơngai đĭch đe, chu kiơ̆ tôm tơdrong juăt kon bơngai tơpă.

English: But when the fullness of the time had come, God sent forth His Son, born of a woman, born under the law
Bahnar: Mă-lei truh boih năr 'Bok Kei-Dei pơkă, Sư wơh Kon Sư jur tơ ala teh âu. Kon bơngai bơ̆n tơpŭ kơ Sư, thoi noh na Sư kiơ̆ tôm tơdrong juăt kon bơngai.

English: to redeem those who were under the law, that we might receive the adoption as sons.
Bahnar: Sư wă kơ gơh huai iŏk đĭ-đăng bơngai bơ̆n mă kiơ̆ tơdrong juăt kon bơngai, na bơ̆n jing kon Kră Yang 'Bok Kei-Dei.

English: And because you are sons, God has sent forth the Spirit of His Son into your hearts, crying out, “Abba, Father!”
Bahnar: Bơ̆n băt boih bơ̆n jing kon Sư tơpă, yua kơ Sư wơh Yang Bơhngol 'Lơ̆ng đơ̆ng Kon Sư jur oei păng bơ̆n, Sư bơtho bơ̆n krao kơ 'Bok Kei-Dei Aba, 'Bă.

English: Therefore you are no longer a slave but a son, and if a son, then an heir of God through Christ.
Bahnar: Thoi noh bơ̆n huay pă thoi bơngai đĭch dơ̆ng boih yua kơ 'Bok Kei-Dei ăn kơ bơ̆n jing kon Sư. Yua kơ bơ̆n kon Sư na Sư ăn kơ bơ̆n tôm tơdrong 'lơ̆ng.

English: But then, indeed, when you did not know God, you served those which by nature are not gods.
Bahnar: Sơ̆ iĕm ưh kơ băt chă Kră Yang 'Bok Kei-Dei ôh, na mă iĕm jing đĭch yang nai, mă-lei yang noh ưh kơ yang tơpă ôh.

English: But now after you have known God, or rather are known by God, how is it that you turn again to the weak and beggarly elements, to which you desire again to be in bondage?
Bahnar: Dang ei iĕm chă Kră Yang 'Bok Kei-Dei 'bôh boih; mă tơpă ưh kơ sĭ bơ̆n chă Sư ôh, Sư krao bơ̆n. Thoi noh boih na yua kơ kiơ iĕm wă kiơ̆ dơ̆ng tơdrong juăt kon bơngai? Kiơ̆ kơ tơdrong juăt noh ưh kơ yua kiơ ôh, ưh kơ đei tơgŭm minh tơdrong kiơ wă kơ bơ̆n yua ôh. Na lơliơ iĕm wă jing đĭch tơdrong juăt kon bơngai bơ̆n dơ̆ng?

English: You observe days and months and seasons and years.
Bahnar: Dang ei iĕm wă kiơ̆ tơdrong juăt kon bơngai tơpă, iĕm wă pơm kiơ̆ rim bơyan đe Juđê.

English: I am afraid for you, lest I have labored for you in vain.
Bahnar: Inh tơtăm kơ lu iĕm, hli kơ tơdrong jang inh tơgŭm iĕm mă ưh kơ đei yua.

English: Brethren, I urge you to become like me, for I became like you. You have not injured me at all.
Bahnar: Ơ lu 'nhŏng oh mă 'mêm, inh wă kơ lu iĕm thoi inh. Inh kư̆m lei-lăi thoi iĕm mơ̆n sơ̆. Inh ưh pă gơnang kơ tơdrong juăt kon bơngai, na lui hloi kơ Yêsu. Iĕm huay kơ pơm glăi hăm inh ôh sơ̆, mă-lei đei pơm glăi hăm Kră Yang boih.

English: You know that because of physical infirmity I preached the gospel to you at the first.
Bahnar: Iĕm oei 'blŏk mơ̆n rŏ lăng tơm hmơm sơ̆ inh năm chă bơtho đe tơdrong 'nao 'lơ̆ng 'blep kơ inh jĭ jăn na inh drong tơ pơlei iĕm, bơtho ăn kơ iĕm tơdrong 'nao 'lơ̆ng Yêsu Krist.

English: And my trial which was in my flesh you did not despise or reject, but you received me as an angel of God, even as Christ Jesus.
Bahnar: Inh jĭ dang noh ră sơ̆, mă-lei iĕm ưh kơ đei pơchê inh ôh păng iĕm kư̆m chu mơ̆ng inh bơtho iĕm mơ̆n. Iĕm sơng iŏk inh noh sơ̆ dang iĕm sơng iŏk linh jang 'lơ̆ng 'Bok Kei-Dei đơ̆ng plĕnh păng dang sơng iŏk Yŏng bơ̆n Yêsu Krist.

English: What then was the blessing you enjoyed? For I bear you witness that, if possible, you would have plucked out your own eyes and given them to me.
Bahnar: Inh lăng iĕm chơt hiôk tơpă kơplah inh bơtho iĕm sơ̆. Na lơliơ dang ei iĕm ưh kơ wă kơ inh dơ̆ng? Sơ̆ iĕm 'mêm kơ inh dêh, iĕm 'mêm kơ inh dang wă kuek klong măt iĕm tah tơ klong măt inh.

English: Have I therefore become your enemy because I tell you the truth?
Bahnar: Đơ̆ng rŏng kơ noh lăp inh tơ nai na đei lu bơngai năm pơtuah pơhlŭ iĕm. Inh kư̆m khan kơ iĕm tơpă boih ki, tơdrong sư pơtuah pơhlŭ iĕm noh ưh kơ yua kiơ kơ iĕm ôh, mă-lei dang ei iĕm lăng inh dang bơngai ayăt kơ iĕm hă?

English: They zealously court you, but for no good; yes, they want to exclude you, that you may be zealous for them.
Bahnar: Lu bơngai mă juăt kơ pơtuah iĕm thoi noh, lu sư lăp đon kơ iĕm mơ̆n, mă-lei lu sư kuă kơ tơgŭm iĕm. Lu sư wă kơ iĕm achăng lê̆ inh, na kiơ̆ lu sư. Lu sư wă kơ iĕm 'mêm kơ lu sư.

English: But it is good to be zealous in a good thing always, and not only when I am present with you.
Bahnar: Gah lu buăl bơ̆n, dah lu sư 'mêm kơ iĕm tơpă trŏ mơ̆n, dah lu sư wă tơgŭm iĕm tơpă. Inh oei păng iĕm inh wă tơpă tơgŭm iĕm; na dang ei inh oei tơ nai, lê̆ kơ buăl bơ̆n dơ̆ng tơgŭm iĕm.

English: My little children, for whom I labor in birth again until Christ is formed in you
Bahnar: Ơ lu kon inh mă 'mêm kơeng, inh wă pơtih gia kơ minh 'nu bơngai drŏ-kăn sư wă tơpŭ kơ kon sư, sư sơ'ngon tơpă mơ̆n, yua kơ sư jĭ. Hlôi sư tơpŭ boih na sư gơh hiôk. Inh kư̆m lei-lăi thoi noh mơ̆n, kơplah iĕm 'nao wă pơtơm lui sơ̆ păng dang ei mơ̆n. Inh sơ'ngon tơpă, inh hli kơ iĕm achăng lê̆ tơdrong lui iĕm. Inh wă kơ iĕm lui kiơ̆ Yêsu Krist trŏ thoi Sư wă 'mơ̆i na inh gơh hiôk chơt.

English: I would like to be present with you now and to change my tone; for I have doubts about you.
Bahnar: Inh 'maih ră mơ̆n oei hơdai păng iĕm dang ei, wă kơ gơh pơma dơnuh hăm iĕm. Inh đĭ sơleng kơ đon tơpă, ưh kơ băt pơm thoi yơ boih tơdrong iĕm dang ei.

English: Tell me, you who desire to be under the law, do you not hear the law?
Bahnar: Iĕm khan wă kiơ̆ tôm tơdrong juăt Môis tơpă, na dang ei inh wă kơ iĕm đŏk lăng tôm kơ hla bơar tơdrong juăt Môis bĕ, wă kơ iĕm hlôh.

English: For it is written that Abraham had two sons: the one by a bondwoman, the other by a freewoman.
Bahnar: Lăm hla bơar sư chih roi sơ̆ khan Abraham đei 'bar 'nu kon drŏ-nglo. Minh 'nu kon đei đơ̆ng sư iŏk đĭch sư pơm akăn. Na gah minh 'nu kon sư dơ̆ng đơ̆ng akăn tơm sư tơpŭ.

English: But he who was of the bondwoman was born according to the flesh, and he of the freewoman through promise
Bahnar: Kon sư mă tơpŭ đơ̆ng sư iŏk kơdih đĭch sư noh, sư tơpŭ rok thoi bôl buăl hmă. Mă-lei kon đơ̆ng akăn tơm sư noh, sư tơpŭ kiơ̆ thoi 'Bok Kei-Dei mơnat kơ Abraham khan wă gô ăn kơ sư kon.

English: which things are symbolic. For these are the two covenants: the one from Mount Sinai which gives birth to bondage, which is Hagar
Bahnar: Tơdrong noh sơ̆ wă pơtih gia kơ bơ̆n thoi âu: 'Bar 'nu akăn sư noh wă khan 'bar tơdrong 'Bok Kei-Dei pơgơ̆p hăm bơ̆n. Minh tơdrong pơgơ̆p noh wă khan tơdrong 'Bok Kei-Dei ăn kơ Môis tơdrong juăt tơ kông Sinai lăm dêh Arabia sơ̆. Dôm lu bơngai mă kiơ̆ tơdrong juăt noh sơ̆, lu sư ưh kơ wă gơnang kơ Yêsu ôh. Thoi noh na lu bơngai mă kiơ̆ tơdrong juăt noh lu sư dang lĕ kơ oei đĭch mơ̆n. Tơdrong noh wă pơtih gia kơ yă Hơgar sư đĭch Abraham, na Abraham iŏk pơm akăn kơdih, truh tơ kon sư kư̆m oei dang đĭch mơ̆n. Yă Hơgar kư̆m wă pơtih gia kơ Pơlei Jêrusalem mơ̆n, yua kơ lu kon pơlei Jêrusalem kư̆m oei thoi lĕ kơ đĭch yua kơ lu sư gơnang kơ akâu kơdih wă kiơ̆ tơdrong juăt Môis khan gơh klaih đơ̆ng tơdrong yoch.

English: for this Hagar is Mount Sinai in Arabia, and corresponds to Jerusalem which now is, and is in bondage with her children
Bahnar: Tơdrong noh sơ̆ wă pơtih gia kơ bơ̆n thoi âu: 'Bar 'nu akăn sư noh wă khan 'bar tơdrong 'Bok Kei-Dei pơgơ̆p hăm bơ̆n. Minh tơdrong pơgơ̆p noh wă khan tơdrong 'Bok Kei-Dei ăn kơ Môis tơdrong juăt tơ kông Sinai lăm dêh Arabia sơ̆. Dôm lu bơngai mă kiơ̆ tơdrong juăt noh sơ̆, lu sư ưh kơ wă gơnang kơ Yêsu ôh. Thoi noh na lu bơngai mă kiơ̆ tơdrong juăt noh lu sư dang lĕ kơ oei đĭch mơ̆n. Tơdrong noh wă pơtih gia kơ yă Hơgar sư đĭch Abraham, na Abraham iŏk pơm akăn kơdih, truh tơ kon sư kư̆m oei dang đĭch mơ̆n. Yă Hơgar kư̆m wă pơtih gia kơ Pơlei Jêrusalem mơ̆n, yua kơ lu kon pơlei Jêrusalem kư̆m oei thoi lĕ kơ đĭch yua kơ lu sư gơnang kơ akâu kơdih wă kiơ̆ tơdrong juăt Môis khan gơh klaih đơ̆ng tơdrong yoch.

English: but the Jerusalem above is free, which is the mother of us all.
Bahnar: Mă-lei kư̆m đei minh pôm Pơlei Jêrusalem nai tơ kơpal plĕnh ti đĕch gơh rơngei. Lu bơngai mă gô oei tơ noh gơh rơngei, yua kơ lu sư lui kơ Yêsu Krist. Pơlei noh wă pơtih gia kơ yă Sara mĕ bơ̆n.

English: For it is written: “Rejoice, O barren, You who do not bear! Break forth and shout, You who are not in labor! For the desolate has many more children Than she who has a husband.”
Bahnar: Lăm sơ̆p hla bơar 'Bok Kei-Dei khan kơ Pơlei Jêrusalem tơ kơpal plĕnh ti thoi âu: “Ơ bơngai hơwŏng, mă kơ biơh jĭ anăp, mă-lei ih gô chơt tơpă. Klo ih achăng lê̆ ih boih, mă-lei ning-mônh ih gô đei kon lơ hloh kơ bơngai mă đei klo dang ei.”

English: Now we, brethren, as Isaac was, are children of promise.
Bahnar: Nge Isăk sơ̆, mĕ sư Sara tơpŭ kiơ̆ thoi 'Bok Kei-Dei mơnat khan wă gô ăn kơ Abraham kon. Thoi noh na bơ̆n dang ei kư̆m lei-lăi mơ̆n, bơ̆n jing kon 'Bok Kei-Dei yua kơ Sư mơnat khan wă gô ăn kơ bơ̆n jing kon Sư.

English: But, as he who was born according to the flesh then persecuted him who was born according to the Spirit, even so it is now.
Bahnar: Hơtai noh sơ̆ kon yă Hơgar bơngai mă tơpŭ rok thoi bôl buăl, lăp sư 'lŏ boih sư pơm kơnê̆ kơ kon mă tơpŭ kiơ̆ thoi Yang Bơhngol 'Lơ̆ng tơgŭm. Na dang ei kư̆m thoi noh mơ̆n. Lu bơngai mă gơnang kơ akâu sư kơdih wă kiơ̆ tơdrong juăt Môis, lu sư pơm kơnê̆ kơ lu kon 'Bok Kei-Dei mă đơ̆ng Yang Bơhngol 'Lơ̆ng ăn tơpŭ kiơ̆ thoi Sư wă.

English: Stand fast therefore in the liberty by which Christ has made us free, and do not be entangled again with a yoke of bondage.
Bahnar: Kră Yang Yêsu Krist ăn kơ bơ̆n rơngei đơ̆ng dôm tơdrong juăt kon bơngai boih. Thoi noh bơ̆n gơh rơngei tơpă. Na iĕm 'nĕ ăn kơ đe pơhlŭ pơlung iĕm gơnang kơ akâu iĕm kơdih wă kiơ̆ tôm tơdrong juăt Môis dơ̆ng. Dah iĕm pơm thoi noh iĕm wih jing đĭch dơ̆ng.

English: Indeed I, Paul, say to you that if you become circumcised, Christ will profit you nothing.
Bahnar: Iĕm mơ̆ng lăng mă nhên bĕ. Inh Pôl bơtho ăn kơ iĕm thoi âu: Lu đe ei bơtho iĕm dang ei, khan athei iĕm kăt tơdra akar kơdih 'mơ̆i na gơh klaih đơ̆ng tơdrong yoch, dah iĕm chu kơ lu sư wă pơm kơ iĕm tơdrong 'noh, lei iĕm ưh pă gơnang kơ Kră Yang Yêsu Krist boih.

English: And I testify again to every man who becomes circumcised that he is a debtor to keep the whole law.
Bahnar: Inh wă khan dơ̆ng kơ iĕm tơpă: Bơngai bu chu kăt tơdra akar, bơngai noh athei kiơ̆ tôm tơdrong juăt Môis nai.

English: You have become estranged from Christ, you who attempt to be justified by law; you have fallen from grace.
Bahnar: Bơngai bu gơnang kơ akâu sư kơdih wă pơm kiơ̆ tơdrong juăt Môis, khan 'Bok Kei-Dei jô̆ sư bơngai 'lơ̆ng tơpăt hăm Sư, bơngai mă tơchĕng thoi noh, sư wă achăng lê̆ Kră Yang Yêsu Krist boih păng 'Bok Kei-Dei ưh kơ jô̆ kơ sư bơngai 'lơ̆ng tơpăt hăm Sư ôh.

English: For we through the Spirit eagerly wait for the hope of righteousness by faith.
Bahnar: Mă-lei gah bơ̆n, bơ̆n băt Kră Yang 'Bok Kei-Dei jô̆ bơ̆n bơngai 'lơ̆ng tơpăt hăm Sư năr tôch ning-mônh yua kơ Yang Bơhngol 'Lơ̆ng ăn kơ bơ̆n lui păng gơnang kơ Kon Sư Yêsu Krist.

English: For in Christ Jesus neither circumcision nor uncircumcision avails anything, but faith working through love.
Bahnar: Bu kiơ̆ Kră Yang Yêsu Krist, tơdrong kăt tơdra akar ưh kơ đei kăl kiơ ôh. Minh tơdrong lui kơ Kră Yang Yêsu Krist păng 'mêm mơnat kơ đe, noh kăl.

English: You ran well. Who hindered you from obeying the truth?
Bahnar: Sơ̆ iĕm lui kơ Yêsu Krist kơjăp tơpă, na liơ iĕm lui kơ đe pơhlŭ pơlung iĕm dang ei dơ̆ng?

English: This persuasion does not come from Him who calls you.
Bahnar: 'Bok Kei-Dei krao iĕm lui sơ̆ ưh kơ sĭ Sư ăn kơ lu bơngai wă pơhlŭ pơlung iĕm dang ei ôh.

English: A little leaven leavens the whole lump.
Bahnar: Bơ̆n pơm 'bĕng mi, bơ̆n tuh đak pơgang pông tơ lăm tơpŭng lăp tŏ sĕt đĕch, mă-lei tơpŭng noh pông jing tih. Na lu bơngai mă pơhlŭ pơlung iĕm dang ei kư̆m lei-lăi thoi noh mơ̆n, sư bơtho rai đunh rai tih.

English: I have confidence in you, in the Lord, that you will have no other mind; but he who troubles you shall bear his judgment, whoever he is.
Bahnar: Yua kơ iĕm lui kơ Kră Yang Yêsu Krist, na inh băt kơ iĕm wă kiơ̆ dôm tơdrong inh bơtho. Mă-lei gah lu bơngai wă pơtuah iĕm noh, mă lu sư bơngai pơm tih, pơm iĕ, 'Bok Kei-Dei wă phak lu sư tơpă ning-mônh.

English: And I, brethren, if I still preach circumcision, why do I still suffer persecution? Then the offense of the cross has ceased.
Bahnar: Ơ 'nhŏng oh, dah inh bơtho athei đe kăt tơdra akar, lei lu bơngai Juđê huay kơ pơm kơnê̆ kơ inh ôh. Na 'nâu inh bơtho gah tơdrong lu bơ̆n lui kơ Yêsu lôch tang bơ̆n tơ 'long pơglang wă kơ gơh klaih đơ̆ng tơdrong yoch ră, na dang ei lu sư ưh kơ lăp đon kơ inh boih. Lu sư oei hăt kơ tơdrong kăt tơdra akar đĕch khan trŏ dêh.

English: I could wish that those who trouble you would even cut themselves off!
Bahnar: Lu sư juăt kơ pơlung iĕm đe kăt tơdra akar, lei lu sư kuă kơ kiơ kơ hlach akar sư kơdih mă tih wă kơ trŏ 'biơ̆?

English: For you, brethren, have been called to liberty; only do not use liberty as an opportunity for the flesh, but through love serve one another.
Bahnar: Ơ lu 'nhŏng oh, gah lu iĕm Kră Yang 'Bok Kei-Dei krao iĕm kiơ̆ Sư boih, wă kơ iĕm rơngei đơ̆ng tơdrong juăt kon bơngai, mă-lei Sư ưh kơ wă kơ bơ̆n pơma khan bơ̆n rơngei đơ̆ng tơdrong juăt kon bơngai boih, mơ̆ng kơ bơ̆n wă pơm kiơ, mă 'lơ̆ng kơnê̆ kư̆m bưh. Ưh ôh, Sư kuă ăn bơ̆n pơm thoi noh ôh. Sư wă kơ bơ̆n 'mêm dih băl đei đon tơchĕng 'mêm mơnat tơgŭm dih băl tơduă bơ̆n.

English: For all the law is fulfilled in one word, even in this: “You shall love your neighbor as yourself.”
Bahnar: Yua kơ 'Bok Kei-Dei pơkă boih kơ bơ̆n thoi âu: “Bơ̆n athei 'mêm kơ bôl buăl thoi bơ̆n 'mêm akâu kơdih.” Bơngai bu răk tơdrong noh sư dang kiơ̆ tôm dôm tơdrong juăt 'Bok Kei-Dei pơkă.

English: But if you bite and devour one another, beware lest you be consumed by one another!
Bahnar: Thoi noh iĕm 'nĕ kơ pơrăm dih băl hli kơ hiong đĭ tơdrong lui iĕm. Dah iĕm pơm thoi noh dang lĕ kơ sem bri tơkăp dih băl jing lôch răm akâu kơdih.

English: I say then: Walk in the Spirit, and you shall not fulfill the lust of the flesh.
Bahnar: Na inh wă khan kơ iĕm thoi âu: Iĕm athei apinh kơdih Yang Bơhngol 'Lơ̆ng mơ̆t pơgơ̆r iĕm ling-lang. Tơdah iĕm pơm thoi noh jơhngơ̆m đon iĕm huay kơ tơchĕng pơm tơdrong kơnê̆ ôh.

English: For the flesh lusts against the Spirit, and the Spirit against the flesh; and these are contrary to one another, so that you do not do the things that you wish.
Bahnar: Dah jơhngơ̆m đon iĕm kuă kiơ̆ Yang Bơhngol 'Lơ̆ng bơtho, thoi noh Yang Bơhngol 'Lơ̆ng lăng jơhngơ̆m đon tơdrong iĕm pơm ưh kơ layơ wă 'blep trŏ thoi Sư wă. Jơhngơ̆m đon iĕm păng Yang Bơhngol 'Lơ̆ng, bre sư pơjrot băl, na iĕm ưh kơ gơh pơm kiơ̆ kơ iĕm wă ôh.

English: But if you are led by the Spirit, you are not under the law.
Bahnar: Dah iĕm ăn Yang Bơhngol 'Lơ̆ng pơgơ̆r iĕm, lei iĕm ưh pă gơnang kơ akâu iĕm kơdih pơm kiơ̆ tơdrong juăt Môis ôh.

English: Now the works of the flesh are evident, which are: adultery, fornication, uncleanness, lewdness
Bahnar: Lu bơngai mă tơchĕng kiơ̆ kơ jơhngơ̆m đon sư kơdih, lu sư pơm tôm tơdrong thoi lu tơ ala âu: Sư ngôi pơyô kư̆ kă, sư ưh kơ gơh wei jơ̆ng ti kơdih

English: idolatry, sorcery, hatred, contentions, jealousies, outbursts of wrath, selfish ambitions, dissensions, heresies
Bahnar: sư oei kơkuh kơ yang so, sư pơm pơjâu chă sol đe; sư kơnam băl tơdrong, sư tôn teh băl, sư tơgar băl, sư hil kơ đe, sư kret, sư kuă kơ jang hơdai đe, sư wă tơklah kiơ̆ tơdrong sư kơdih

English: envy, murders, drunkenness, revelries, and the like; of which I tell you beforehand, just as I also told you in time past, that those who practice such things will not inherit the kingdom of God.
Bahnar: sư 'nhĕng kơ đe, sư suai sik pơm kư̆ kă, sư pơm lơ tơdrong kơnê̆, lơ tơdrong noh nai dơ̆ng. Inh wă pơma dơ̆ng kơ iĕm thoi inh roi boih kơ iĕm sơ̆: Dôm lu bơngai pơm thoi noh ưh kơ gơh oei hơdai tơ dêh char 'Bok Kei-Dei ôh ning-mônh.

English: But the fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, longsuffering, kindness, goodness, faithfulness
Bahnar: Mă-lei plei Yang Bơhngol 'Lơ̆ng đei: 'Mêm mơnat, chơt hiôk, hơđơ̆ng, kĕ chơ̆n, gơh tơgŭm, iơ̆m dim, tơnăp,a

English: gentleness, self-control. Against such there is no law.
Bahnar: iŏk đon ala, gơh gơ̆t, dôm tơdrong 'lơ̆ng 'noh yua kơ đơ̆ng Yang Bơhngol 'Lơ̆ng tơgŭm bơ̆n ngăl. Tơdrong juăt 'Bok Kei-Dei ưh kơ đei găn khă ôh dôm lu tơdrong 'lơ̆ng noh.b

English: And those who are Christ’s have crucified the flesh with its passions and desires.
Bahnar: Lu bơ̆n bơngai lui kơ Kră Yang Yêsu Krist đĭ hŭt lê̆ boih dôm lu tơdrong mă đon bơ̆n juăt kơ tơchĕng pơm tơdrong kơnê̆, dang lĕ kơ bơ̆n pơ̆ng dôm tơdrong noh tơ 'long pơglang.

English: If we live in the Spirit, let us also walk in the Spirit.
Bahnar: Yang Bơhngol 'Lơ̆ng ăn kơ bơ̆n jing kon 'Bok Kei-Dei, na bơ̆n kư̆m athei ăn kơ Sư pơgơ̆r bơ̆n khŏm khŏm mơ̆n.

English: Let us not become conceited, provoking one another, envying one another.
Bahnar: Bơ̆n 'nĕ pơang akâu bơ̆n kơdih. Bơ̆n 'nĕ chă tơdrong wă tơhil dih băl păng 'nĕ kơ 'nhĕng dih băl.

English: Brethren, if a man is overtaken in any trespass, you who are spiritual restore such a one in a spirit of gentleness, considering yourself lest you also be tempted.
Bahnar: Ơ 'nhŏng oh, dah iĕm 'bôh lu 'nhŏng oh bơ̆n bơngai lui pơm tơdrong yoch, na lu iĕm mă lui kơjăp, iĕm athei tơgŭm sư pơm mă 'lơ̆ng hŏ. Iĕm tơgŭm sư, iĕm kư̆m athei 'mêm mơnat kơ sư mơ̆n, 'nĕ hil kơ sư păng iĕm athei kơchăng akâu iĕm kơdih mơ̆n, hli kơ yang Satan kư̆m wă pơhlŭ pơlung iĕm.

English: Bear one another’s burdens, and so fulfill the law of Christ.
Bahnar: Iĕm gơh tơgŭm dih băl thoi noh trŏ tơpă, thoi Kră Yang Yêsu Krist pơkă.

English: For if anyone thinks himself to be something, when he is nothing, he deceives himself.
Bahnar: Mă-lei dah bơngai bu lui ưh kơjăp na sư roi kơ đe khan sư lui kơjăp, bơngai 'noh bơngai hơlĕnh.

English: But let each one examine his own work, and then he will have rejoicing in himself alone, and not in another.
Bahnar: Na bơ̆n athei pơlong lăng tơdrong jang bơ̆n tơ lăm tơdrong jang 'Bok Kei-Dei, wă kơ băt bơ̆n jang 'lơ̆ng dah ưh. Dah bơ̆n băt kơdih bơ̆n jang 'lơ̆ng, bơ̆n gô lăp đon hiôk chơt kơdih bơ̆n. Bơ̆n 'nĕ pơang akâu bơ̆n kơdih khan bơ̆n lui hloh kơ đe.

English: For each one shall bear his own load.
Bahnar: Păng bơ̆n athei wei tơdrong jang bơ̆n kơdih.

English: Let him who is taught the word share in all good things with him who teaches.
Bahnar: Gah lu 'bok thây mă bơtho tơdrong 'Bok Kei-Dei kơ lu bơ̆n, bơ̆n athei tơgŭm asong sư tơmam bơ̆n.

English: Do not be deceived, God is not mocked; for whatever a man sows, that he will also reap.
Bahnar: Iĕm 'nĕ tơchĕng khan iĕm gơh hơlĕnh kơ 'Bok Kei-Dei, yua kơ Sư băt tôm tơdrong. Bơ̆n pơtăm găr kiơ gô đei plei 'nei tơpă.

English: For he who sows to his flesh will of the flesh reap corruption, but he who sows to the Spirit will of the Spirit reap everlasting life.
Bahnar: Thoi noh boih, dah bơ̆n chu kiơ̆ kơ jơhngơ̆m đon bơ̆n kơdih wă pơm tơdrong kơnê̆, lei bơ̆n gô răm. Dah bơ̆n wă chu kơ Yang Bơhngol 'Lơ̆ng đĕch lei Yang Bơhngol 'Lơ̆ng gô ăn kơ bơ̆n arih ling-lang hăm 'Bok Kei-Dei.

English: And let us not grow weary while doing good, for in due season we shall reap if we do not lose heart.
Bahnar: Mă-lei bơ̆n athei chu kơ Sư khŏm khŏm wă kơ bơ̆n gơh pơm đon 'lơ̆ng. Thoi noh dah bơ̆n huay kơ achăng lê̆ Sư na mưh trŏ kơ năr 'Bok Kei-Dei pơkă ning-mônh Sư gô ăn kơ bơ̆n tơdrong apah na bơ̆n oei hơdai hăm Sư ling-lang. Kư̆m thoi bơ̆n pơtăm găr, dah bơ̆n ưh kơ hŭt lê̆ tơdrong jang bơ̆n, lei trŏ bơyan plei, bơ̆n đei phĕ iŏk tơpă.

English: Therefore, as we have opportunity, let us do good to all, especially to those who are of the household of faith.
Bahnar: Na dang ei bơ̆n oei arih tơ ala teh, bơ̆n athei pơm 'lơ̆ng kơ đe ling-lang. Mă loi athei pơm 'lơ̆ng kơ lu bơngai lui bơ̆n.

English: See with what large letters I have written to you with my own hand!
Bahnar: Iĕm lăng. Kơthơ âu nơ̆r inh pơma, buăl nhôn chih; lăp wă jê̆ tôch âu na ti inh chih kơdih. Na inh chih chư phara 'biơ̆ kơ kơpal 'nâu.

English: As many as desire to make a good showing in the flesh, these would compel you to be circumcised, only that they may not suffer persecution for the cross of Christ.
Bahnar: Lu bơngai wă pơang akâu kơdih, sư wă kơ đe jô̆ sư bơngai 'lơ̆ng, mă tơpă sư boih wă pơgŏ iĕm kăt tơdra akar. Sư pơgŏ iĕm thoi noh sư wă kơ đe huay kơ areh păng pơm kơnê̆ kơ sư. Dah sư khan bơ̆n ưh kơ kăl kăt tơdra akar, athei lui kơ Yêsu Krist lôch tang bơ̆n tơ 'long pơglang đĕch, lei sư hli kơ đe nai pơm kơnê̆ kơ lu sư dơ̆ng.

English: For not even those who are circumcised keep the law, but they desire to have you circumcised that they may boast in your flesh.
Bahnar: Lu bơngai wă pơgŏ iĕm noh, sư kăt tơdra akar sư kơdih mơ̆n mă-lei sư ưh kơ kiơ̆ tơdrong juăt Môis tơpă ôh. Lu sư wă kơ iĕm kăt tơdra akar iĕm kơdih đĕch păng sư wă pơma pơang kơ đe khan sư bơtho lơ bơngai chu kăt tơdra akar tơpă.

English: But God forbid that I should boast except in the cross of our Lord Jesus Christ, by whom the world has been crucified to me, and I to the world.
Bahnar: Gah inh ưh kơ đei pơang akâu inh kơdih ôh, inh wă pơang đe gah 'long pơglang Yêsu đĕch. Yua kơ Kră Yang Yêsu Krist lôch tang inh tơ 'long pơglang tơpă na inh lê̆ đĭ-đăng tơdrong ala teh âu, dang lĕ inh pơ̆ng lê̆ dôm tơdrong ala teh âu tơ 'long pơglang, kư̆m dang inh lôch tơ 'long pơglang ưh pă kiơ̆ dôm tơdrong ala teh âu.

English: For in Christ Jesus neither circumcision nor uncircumcision avails anything, but a new creation.
Bahnar: Tơdrong kăt tơdra akar ưh kơ đei kăl kiơ ôh. Tơdrong Yang Bơhngol 'Lơ̆ng ăn kơ bơ̆n jing bơngai 'nao, 'noh đĕch kăl.

English: And as many as walk according to this rule, peace and mercy be upon them, and upon the Israel of God.
Bahnar: Inh apinh 'Bok Kei-Dei mơnat ăn kơ dôm lu bơngai lui kiơ̆ tơdrong noh, lu sư boih kon 'Bok Kei-Dei tơpă, lu sư boih đe anăn bơngai Isơrael. Inh apinh 'Bok Kei-Dei ăn kơ lu sư hiôk-hian.

English: From now on let no one trouble me, for I bear in my body the marks of the Lord Jesus.
Bahnar: Đơ̆ng âu tơ anăp, mă bu bu 'nĕ pă pơma khan inh ưh kơ trŏ kơ bơngai jơ̆ng 'bang Yêsu dah khan inh ưh kơ bơtho tơdrong Sư tơpă. Inh jơ̆ng 'bang Sư tơpă na inh gơh đei rơka đêl đe tôn teh inh âu.

English: Brethren, the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirit. Amen.
Bahnar: Ơ lu 'nhŏng oh, nhôn apinh Kră Yang Yêsu Krist wei-lăng rim 'nu kơ lu iĕm tôm tơdrong. A-men.
